tr.td: **Bias Image File** Image of the additive stationary pattern in the electronic zero point of the UVIS CCDs.More...
**Dark Image File** Image of the signal detected in the absence of photons from the sky.More...
**Pixel-to-pixel Flat Image File** Relative variations in pixel-to-pixel sensitivity of the detector.More...
**Delta Flat Image File** Changes to the small scale flat field contained in the PFLTFILE.More...
**Low-order Flat Image File** A map of the large scale variations in the sensitivity across the detector.More...
**Shutter Shading Correction Image File** Correction for shading caused by the CCD shutter during very short exposures.More...
**Small Scale Distortion Image File** Correction deltas for small scale detector distortions.More...
**Analog-to-Digital Correction Table** Corrections to assigned DN Values.More...
**Aperture Description Table** Geometric description of the apertures and their offsets (in arcseconds) from a reference aperture.More...
**Aperture Throughput Table** Wavelength-dependent transmissions for each aperture with respect to a reference aperture.More...
**Bad Pixel Table** Table of all known permanently bad pixels.More...
**CCD Parameters Table** CCD operating parameters, indexed on the readout amplifier.More...
**Cosmic Ray Rejection Parameters Table** Parameters used in cosmic ray rejection algorithm.More...
**Dispersion Coefficients Table** Coefficients to the nominal dispersion solution to be applied to extracted 1-D spectra.More...
**Grating-Aperture Correction Table** Correction vectors for the 52X* and 52X*E1 apertures when used with the G230LB, G430L, and G750L gratings.More...
**Incidence Angle Correction Table** Coefficients to fits of the change in two dispersion coefficients as a function of angular offset from the reference position.More...
**Image Distortion Correction Table** A set of world coordinate information and fits to a distortion function.More...
**MAMA Linearity Table** Global and local count rate limits in the nonlinearity correction.More...
**Calibration Lamp Table** Spectra of the calibration lamps obtained at each of the operating currents.More...
**MAMA Offset Correction Table** Coefficients to fits of the change in the dispersion coefficients as a function of commanded offset from the reference position.More...
**Photometric Correction Table** Correction factors for PHT.More...
**Photometric Conversion Table** Throughput of the instrument configuration as a function of wavelength, assuming an infinite aperture.More...
**2-D Spectrum Distortion Correction** Set of world coordinate information used to construct rectified, linearized 2-D spectra.More...
**Echelle Scattering Table** Area-normalized scattering profiles for STIS echelle gratings, as a function of offset measured in low-resolution MAMA pixels.More...
**Echelle Cross-Dispersion Scattering Table** Area-normalized profiles describing smearing of echelle scattered light in the cross-dispersion direction.More...
**Detector Halo Table** Volume-normalized detector halo images at one or more reference wavelengths for each echelle grating.More...
**Echelle Ripple Table** Peak-normalized ripple (or blaze) functions for echelle gratings.More...
**Scattering Reference Wavelength Table** Halo reference wavelengths and PSF reference wavelengths used for correcting the two-dimensional effects of scattered light.More...
**NUV Dark Correction Table** Time- and temperature-dependent characterization of the global rate of dark counts.More...
**Time Dependent Sensitivity Files** Measures the change in the sensitivity of the detectors with time.More...
**Wavecal Parmeters Table** Parameters which control the wavecal processing.More...
**1-D Spectrum Trace Table** Displacements of spectra along Axis2 for determining the location of a spectrum prior to extracting the 1-D spectrum.More...
**1-D Extraction Parameters Table** The apertures (or "boxes") and methods used in the extraction of 1-D spectra.More...
